issue.title: Indoor navigation & download by grid
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

With indoor navigation available for vizualisation, it would be interesting to allow the download by grid to be perform as well in an indoor context : the grid layer would be compatible with indoor navigation, and the feature selection could be made inside indoor level. 

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.1

comments.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

TC ok.
